task.title: Edit the initial buffer time and play buffer time for the reference implementation

taskbody.context: You can use the Buffer control panel on the Settings interface to edit the initial buffer time and play buffer time. When you edit these parameters through the Settings interface, the configuration in SharedPreferences is updated and the player is updated.

step.cmd: Enter values for Initial buffer time and Play buffer time.
step.stepresult: The Settings application automatically saves and updates the values in SharedPreferences.
